name: PiraSea
description:
Shoot down the enemy ships and be the person who survives the apocalypse with the ultimate goal of stocking up enough toilet paper to last 17 lifetimes!

PiraSea is an exploration game where the objective is to visit various cool looking islands and capsize enemy ships as they show up near aforementioned islands, all while collecting that sweet, elusive toilet paper!

Controls:
A, D - Rotate ship
W, S - Accelerate / Decelerate
Left Mouse - Shoot left
Right Mouse - Shoot right

What we did:

  • Ocean: Texture generation shader and a vertex shader for the waves.
  • Islands: they are mostly generated by modifying blobs with a vertex shader, and colored based on the height in world-space.
  • Map generation: We generate an entire archipelago for you to explore and place enemies for you to capsize 😈
  • Player Controller: Third-person camera, and controls of the ship.
  • Enemy AI: Enemies flank you and try to shoot you dead 😉
  • Sound system: Basic setting sounds up from collections of same type to play using a pool of audiosources
  • Particles: Oh so many! 🎈🎈✨✨🎇🎇
  • Toilet paper: You know you want it! Rigged and animated for your pleasure 😎
  • The art and models: If not mentioned below we made it ourselves.
  • And a lot more!

What we didn't do:

  • Ship models (asset store)
    • Although a variant with a revamped texture was made!
  • Sound files (asset store)
  • Skybox (asset store)
